attributes.action: Give Captain Tom Moore a knighthood
attributes.additional_details: The government need to recognise what he has done for his country and the NHS in this difficult time.
attributes.background: Captain Tom Moore has raised over £12, 000,000 for the NHS. He is almost 100 years old and deserves to have his amazing achievement recognised. He has fought for his county now he is fighting for the NHS. He is nothing short of remarkable.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
